verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Also, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; An <S%H7093>end<s%>, the <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> upon the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Now is the <S%H7093>end<s%> come upon thee, and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> mine <S%H639>anger<s%> upon thee, and will <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> upon thee all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>. recompense: Heb. give

And mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%> thee, neither will I have <S%H2550>pity<s%>: but I will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> upon thee, and thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; An <S%H7451>evil<s%>, an <S%H259>only<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, behold, is <S%H935>come<s%>.
An <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>: it <S%H6974>watcheth<s%> for thee; behold, it is <S%H935>come<s%>. watcheth for: Heb. awaketh against

The <S%H6843>morning<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, O thou that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>: the <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H935><s%>, the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4103>trouble<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%>, and not the sounding <S%H1906>again<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>. sounding: or, echo

Now will I <S%H7138>shortly<s%> pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon thee, and <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> mine <S%H639>anger<s%> upon thee: and I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> thee for all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

And mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither will I have <S%H2550>pity<s%>: I will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> and thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that are in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%>. thee according: Heb. upon thee, etc

Behold the <S%H3117>day<s%>, behold, it is <S%H935>come<s%>: the <S%H6843>morning<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%>; the <S%H4294>rod<s%> hath <S%H6692>blossomed<s%>, <S%H2087>pride<s%> hath <S%H6524>budded<s%>.

<S%H2555>Violence<s%> is risen <S%H6965>up<s%> into a <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>: none of them shall remain, nor of their <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, nor of <S%H1991>any<s%> of theirs: neither shall there be <S%H5089>wailing<s%> for them. theirs: or, their tumultuous persons: Heb. tumult

The <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H3117>day<s%> draweth <S%H5060>near<s%>: let not the <S%H7069>buyer<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, nor the <S%H4376>seller<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%>: for <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is upon all the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> thereof.

For the <S%H4376>seller<s%> shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> to that which is <S%H4465>sold<s%>, although they were yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>: for the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is touching the whole <S%H1995>multitude<s%> thereof, which shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>; neither shall <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> himself in the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%>. although they: Heb. though their life were yet among the living in the: or, whose life is in his iniquity the iniquity: Heb. his iniquity

They have <S%H8628>blown<s%> the <S%H8619>trumpet<s%>, even to make all <S%H3559>ready<s%>; but none <S%H1980>goeth<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>: for my <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is upon all the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> thereof.

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2351>without<s%>, and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%>: he that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and he that is in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> him.

But they that <S%H6403>escape<s%> of them shall <S%H6412>escape<s%>, and shall be on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> like <S%H3123>doves<s%> of the <S%H1516>valleys<s%>, all of them <S%H1993>mourning<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> for his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
All <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble<s%>, and all <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H3212>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>. be weak: Heb. go into water

They shall also <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H6427>horror<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> them; and <S%H955>shame<s%> shall be upon all <S%H6440>faces<s%>, and <S%H7144>baldness<s%> upon all their <S%H7218>heads<s%>.

They shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>, and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall be <S%H5079>removed<s%>: their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: they shall not <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> their <S%H5315>souls<s%>, neither <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H4578>bowels<s%>: because it is the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>. removed: Heb. for a separation, or, uncleanness it is: or, their iniquity is their stumblingblock

As for the <S%H6643>beauty<s%> of his <S%H5716>ornament<s%>, he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in <S%H1347>majesty<s%>: but they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6754>images<s%> of their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and of their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> therein: therefore have I <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H5079>far<s%> from them. set it far: or, made it unto them an unclean thing

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> for a <S%H957>prey<s%>, and to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for a <S%H7998>spoil<s%>; and they shall <S%H2490>pollute<s%> it.

My <S%H6440>face<s%> will I <S%H5437>turn<s%> also from them, and they shall <S%H2490>pollute<s%> my <S%H6845>secret<s%> place: for the <S%H6530>robbers<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into it, and <S%H2490>defile<s%> it. robbers: or, burglers

<S%H6213>Make<s%> a <S%H7569>chain<s%>: for the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H4941>crimes<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%>.

Wherefore I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>worst<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%>: I will also make the <S%H1347>pomp<s%> of the <S%H5794>strong<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>; and their holy <S%H6942>places<s%> shall be <S%H2490>defiled<s%> <S%H5157><s%>. their holy: or, they shall inherit their holy places
<S%H7089>Destruction<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>; and they shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and there shall be none. Destruction: Heb. Cutting off

<S%H1943>Mischief<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H1943>mischief<s%>, and <S%H8052>rumour<s%> shall be upon <S%H8052>rumour<s%>; then shall they <S%H1245>seek<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>; but the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H2205>ancients<s%>.

The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, and the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H926>troubled<s%>: I will <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them after their <S%H1870>way<s%>, and according to their <S%H4941>deserts<s%> will I <S%H8199>judge<s%> them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. according: Heb. with their judgments
